title: Welcome to Your Justia Insights Newsletter
message: Stay informed with the newsletter designed to bring updates and insights from our team directly to the Justia Connect community.

Get our answers to some common SEO questions and learn more about the consequences of failing to prioritize web accessibility. Catch up on the legal and technology news that recently made headlines and take a peek at what the Justia team has been up to over the last month.

title: It’s Time to Improve Your Visibility on Google
message: Join us for our inaugural free Justia Webinar exclusive to Justia Connect members, SEO for Law Firm Websites: Intro to SEO & Website Content.
Learn from Justia CEO and SEO expert Tim Stanley as you discover ways to enhance your law firm’s presence in Google Search results.
bottomline: Space is limited! Reserve your spot before it is too late.
note:
Already registered? No need to register again!
We have you on our list and look forward to seeing you on June 23!

message: Hi {Name},
You’ve successfully registered for the SEO for Lawyers webinar! We will see you on June 23, 2022 at 11:00am PT/2:00pm ET.
Be on the lookout for an email from Zoom with your personal link to access this webinar. If you have questions or need assistance with your registration, please contact Justia Support.
Don’t forget to save the date!

Sincerely,
The Justia Connect Team
bottomline: Don’t be. Justia Connect Pros receive exclusive access
to recordings of all Justia Webinars

title: Don’t Miss The Chance to Help Your Firm Grow
message: Still haven’t registered for our inaugural Justia Webinar? Just one week remains before Justia CEO Tim Stanley leads Justia Connect members in an exclusive learning opportunity that will help your law firm explore key strategies to improve its online performance by using content to reach more clients.
bottomline: Only a few more seats remain for this exciting event!
note: Already registered? You can disregard this email. We’re looking forward to seeing you on June 23!

title: New Seats Available for Upcoming Justia Webinar
message: Didn’t register for our upcoming webinar? Today is your lucky day!
Due to the overwhelming response received for our inaugural webinar for Justia Connect members, we have added additional seats to our upcoming webinar.

Get insights from our CEO designed to help your law firm better understand and implement strategies to further optimize your law firm website content for better online performance and increased growth.
We only added a handful of additional seats so be sure to RSVP as soon as possible!
note:
Already registered for our upcoming webinar?

title: Reminder: Your Webinar Is Today
message: Hi {Name},
Don’t forget that your SEO for Law Firm Websites: Intro to SEO & Website Content webinar starts at 11:00am PT/1:00pm ET today

You should have received an email from Zoom with your personal link to access this webinar. If you have not received this email, please check your spam folder. If you are still unable to locate your webinar link, please contact Justia Support immediately for assistance

Important Note: This webinar will be held via Zoom. To avoid any delays when joining our webinar, please be sure that you have the most recent version of the Zoom platform downloaded on your personal device. If you have not used Zoom before, you can start the download process here.

Sincerely,
The Justia Connect Team

title: Catch the Replay of Our Most Recent Justia Webinar
message: Hi {Name},
